mapper.select: SELECT t.task_id, t.task_name, t.task_type, t.db_type, t.procedure_name, t.execute_type, t.execute_next, t.execute_period, t.scan_type, date_format( t.scan_next, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' ) AS scan_next, t.scan_period, t.scan_execute, t.dependency, t.allow_start, t.allow_end, t.`group`, t.`order`, t.`status`, date_format( t.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' ) AS create_date, date_format( t.update_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' ) AS update_date FROM tb_ucpaas_task t WHERE t.task_id = #{task_id}

SELECT count(0) AS totalCount FROM tb_ucpaas_task t WHERE t.task_name = #{task_name}
AND t.task_id != #{task_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_ucpaas_task ( task_name, task_type, db_type, procedure_name, execute_type, execute_next, execute_period, scan_type, scan_next, scan_period, scan_execute, dependency, allow_start, allow_end, `group`, `order`, `status`, create_date, update_date ) VALUES ( #{task_name}, #{task_type}, #{db_type}, #{procedure_name}, #{execute_type}, #{execute_next}, #{execute_period}, #{scan_type}, #{scan_next}, #{scan_period}, #{scan_execute}, #{dependency}, #{allow_start}, #{allow_end}, #{group}, #{order}, 0, now(), now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_ucpaas_task t SET t.task_name = #{task_name}, t.task_type = #{task_type}, t.db_type = #{db_type}, t.procedure_name = #{procedure_name}, t.execute_type = #{execute_type}, t.execute_next = #{execute_next}, t.execute_period = #{execute_period}, t.scan_type = #{scan_type}, t.scan_next = #{scan_next}, t.scan_period = #{scan_period}, t.scan_execute = #{scan_execute}, t.dependency = #{dependency}, t.allow_start = #{allow_start}, t.allow_end = #{allow_end}, t.`group` = #{group}, t.`order` = #{order}, t.update_date = now() WHERE t.task_id = #{task_id}
